issue.title: [C++] Remove needless out argument from arrow::internal::InvertBitmap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12864](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12864). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
arrow::internal::InvertBitmap is defined in bitmap_ops.h

but there seems to be a small mistake in the impl bimap_ops.cc [2] (more like a type IMO)

[1] <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/util/bitmap_ops.h#L81>

[2] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/util/bitmap_ops.cc#L392

comments.body:
